content:
Pocono Raceway Series

The energy of racing season is upon us. With Pocono Raceway just a 15 minute drive from Split Rock, our resort serves as the perfect base to enjoy a weekend of racing excitement. There's nothing more electrifying than experiencing the speed and power of these high performance machines in person.

Pennsylvania 400 (NASCAR): July 29 - 31, 2016
ABC Supply 500 (INDYCAR): August 20 - 21, 2016
